page.title: 08ST. ALBANS CHURCH
page.content: St.Albans Church is just one of the churches in Forest Town.It has two graveyards.The religion of it is the Church of England. The church has arched windows. But some of them are stained. Inside there is a font which they use to christen babies in. The service is on Sundays.Inside the church the seats that you sit on are called pews. There is a choir but it is not very big. A lady plays the organ. The vicar is called Rev.Walford. There is the vicar's house next door and a church hall. The church is not very old, in fact the school is older than the church. The church was built in 1910 and the school was built in 1908.There is another church in Forest Town. It is a Methodist Church and it is quite new. {LEE RHOADES, {ANDREW WALLACE, DANIEL CHAMBERS
